page.title: 05FARMING
page.content: This is a farming area.The farms are mainly Dairy and Beef.Recently, however,farming has begun to change.Dairy farmers have been restricted by Milk Quotas and Beef farming is no longer very profitable because of high interest rates on loans.So, many farmers are turning to Arable farming, growing wheat, oats, barley and maize. Frost farm is a typical farm in this area.The man who own's the farm can't afford to sell beef cattle,so he started to grow crop's to supplement his income. At present he has 42 bullock's.Frost farm is 17o acres of land. The farm house was built in 1650.They have 25 chickens.Their machinery includes 4tractors, 1forage harvestor,1bailer and a sprayer to name just a few .
